snippet.title: Golem Gates Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Golem Gates blends elements of real-time strategy (RTS), multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA), and card battle.

Players collect spell cards (called Glyphs) and strategically weave them into a deck as they prepare for battle. Battles are fast-paced and highly tactical with streamlined resource management to keep focus on the action. 

With a single player campaign and various competitive and cooperative online modes, Golem Gates is coming as a complete, one-time-purchase to PC/Steam in early 2018.

www.golemgates.com
